## RadioBrowserApi.voteForStation() method

Votes for station. This method should be used when user adds the station to favourites etc..

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
voteForStation(id: string, fetchConfig?: RequestInit): Promise<{
        ok: boolean;
        message: string;
        stationuuid: string;
        name: string;
        url: string;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | Station id |
|  fetchConfig | RequestInit | Fetch configuration |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ ok: boolean; message: string; stationuuid: string; name: string; url: string; }&gt;

Station vote object
